#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int hcf (int a , int b)
{

    while(a!=b)
    {
        if(a>b)
            a=a-b;
        else
            b=b-a;
    }

    return a ;

}

int main()
{
    int test ;

    cin >> test ;

    for (int i = 0 ; i < test ; i ++)
    {
        int n , m ;
        cin >> n >> m ;


        if (n == 1 )
        {
            cout << m << endl ;
        }
        else if (m == 1)
        {
            cout << n << endl ;
        }
        else
        {
            int div = hcf(n-1,m-1) ;

            int numerator = (n-1) / div ;
            int denomenator = (m-1) / div ;

            int j_max = (n-1) / numerator ;

            int ans = min(j_max , (m-1)/denomenator) ;

            cout << ans + 1 << endl ;
        }

    }

    return 0;
}
